DESCRIPTION:
In subway tunnels under the ruins of a post apocalyptic Moscow remnants of mankind reflect deadly attacks from outside and inside. Mutants been patronizing the catacombs and prey on those who dare to climb the lifeless surface of the poisoned air. But instead of unite, the town metro station continually at war in pursuit of a doomsday device from a military bunker D6 capable of giving them absolute power. Burns civil war that threatens to wipe from the face of the earth the last people. Your character is Artem, consumed with guilt, but not losing hope. Now it depends on you, our survival in this dark hour...

Keep on exciting fights exotic improvised weapon against humans and mutants! Attack enemies, stealthily creeping to him under the cover of darkness!
Explore a post-apocalyptic world of Moscow metro in one of the most realistic and atmospheric games ever created!
